thread.title: Boston‚Äôs Jayson Tatum asks us not to take Al Horford for granted
thread.title_full: Boston‚Äôs Jayson Tatum asks us not to take Al Horford for granted

author: Justin Quinn
title: Boston‚Äôs Jayson Tatum asks us not to take Al Horford for granted
text:
Veteran Boston Celtics forward Al Horford may not fill up the stat sheet with gaudy numbers, but what he does for the Celtics has been the engine that has kept Boston at the top of the standings this season, and All-NBA teammate Jayson Tatum wants to be sure you know it.
Lauding Horford after the Celtics‚Äô blowout win of the Indiana Pacers at Gainbridge Fieldhouse on Saturday night, Tatum let it be known we need to appreciate what the Florida alum brings to Boston. ‚ÄúWe just can‚Äôt keep taking him for granted,‚Äù said the St. Louis native via Boston Dot Com‚Äôs Colin McCarthy .
‚Äú(He‚Äôs the) best teammate I ever had, ultimate professional, and somebody that we can count on, night in and night out,‚Äù added Tatum. ‚ÄúHe proved that again tonight.‚Äù
New ep of the Celtics Lab Podcast on YouTube, via @CLNSMedia ‚òòÔ∏èüß™üì∫
Looking ahead at a tough January schedule before @YossiGozlan explains why it will be tough for Boston to swing a big trade this season
Sponsored by: @FDSportsbook https://t.co/pLvKt1kmGq
‚Äî Celtics Lab Podcast (@CelticsLab) January 4, 2024
The 16-season vet has indeed been as integral as ever to what the Celtics need on any given night in spite of the fact that Horford is putting up a career low in scoring.
But as has been the case for some time, the intangibles that do not show up in the box score ‚Äî and plenty that do ‚Äî have become almost clockwork for Boston as he scales his production and energy up or down depending on the role he is asked to play.
And as Tatum notes, we should not take that for granted.
